actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To amend the Wagner-Peyser Act to clarify that nothing in that Act shall prohibit a State from using individuals other than merit-staffed or civil service employees of the State (or any political subdivision thereof) in providing employment services under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Wagner-Peyser Act to declare that nothing in such Act shall prohibit a State from using individuals other than merit-staffed or civil service employees of the State (or any of its local governments) in providing employment services under such Act.

titles.title: To amend the Wagner-Peyser Act to clarify that nothing in that Act shall prohibit a State from using individuals other than merit-staffed or civil service employees of the State (or any political subdivision thereof) in providing employment services under that Act.
